name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Security Engineer with 13+ years of experience delivering high-performance applications, particularly within the healthcare and financial industries. Proficient in **AWS** for cloud-native system deployment and adept in scripting languages including **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python**. Skilled in implementing security measures including Static Application Security Testing (**SAST**), Software Composition Analysis (**SCA**), and aligning with compliance standards like **ISO 27001** and **ISO 27002**. Demonstrated ability to assess third-party applications effectively while communicating fluently in English. Strong foundational background in full stack development with hands-on expertise in frameworks like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and backend technologies including **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in deploying AI/ML-powered platforms, integrating predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing methodologies.

Provided technical guidance in configuring security protocols, actively participating in audits and compliance reviews to ensure continual adherence to industry standards and best practices.
Produced detailed security documentation and reports, enhancing communication and understanding of security requirements for non-technical stakeholders, thereby fostering a secure development lifecycle.
Engaged in continuous learning and technical skill enhancement, staying updated on the latest security threats and trends in software engineering to uphold a proactive security posture across all projects.

Implemented and managed security protocols in cloud environments, leveraging **AWS** services to ensure compliance with **ISO 27001** and **ISO 27002** standards, enhancing overall data protection and risk management.
Utilized **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Python** to conduct static application security testing (SAST) and software composition analysis (SCA) within development pipelines, ensuring code accuracy and vulnerability assessments.
Conducted thorough third-party assessment processes to evaluate the security frameworks of partners and vendors, aligning with compliance initiatives and risk mitigation strategies.
Developed robust scripts in **Bash** for automating security tasks and improving operational efficiencies across security protocols, resulting in a **30%** reduction in manual overhead.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement security measures for high-volume transaction systems, validating security controls and minimizing vulnerabilities.
Designed and executed security training and awareness programs in **English**, fostering a culture of security-first mentality among developers and stakeholders, leading to a **40%** decrease in security incidents reported.
Adopted tools and best practices from the latest security trends, actively contributing to the modernization of security frameworks and policies within the organization.
